title: How to reset your password
content: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email and follow the instructions sent to your inbox. The link expires in 1 hour.

title: Refund Policy
content: We offer full refunds within 14 days of purchase if the product is unused. Contact support with your order ID to initiate a refund request.

title: Shipping Times
content: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping delivers in 2-3 days. International orders may take up to 21 days due to customs.
